title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Capital
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Capital 

Requirements) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 8 July 2022. 

Definition
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (capital requirements) (amendment) (no 3) regulation 2021 (2) regulation come operation 8 july 2022 definition

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: In these Regulations, “Principal Act” means the Asset Covered Securities
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Act” means the Asset Covered Securities 

Act 2001 (No. 47 of 2001). 

Amendment of section 3 of Principal Act
text_norm: 2 regulation principal act mean asset covered security act 2001 (no 47 2001) amendment section 3 principal act

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 3. Section 3 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (1)—
text_raw:
3. Section 3 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (1)— 

(a) by the insertion of the following definition: 

“ ‘Capital Requirements Directive’ means Directive 2013/36/EU 
of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 June 20133, 
as amended by— 

(a) Directive 2014/17/EU of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 4 February 20144 on credit 
agreements for consumers relating to residential 
immovable property and amending Directives 
2008/48/EC and 2013/36/EU and Regulation (EU) 
No 1093/2010, 

(b) Directive 2014/59/EU of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 15 May 20145 establishing a 
framework for the recovery and resolution of credit 
institutions and investment firms and amending 

1 OJ No. L. 176, 27.6.2013, p. 338. 
2 OJ No. L. 68, 26.2.2021, p. 14. 
3 OJ No. L. 176, 27.6.2013, p. 338. 
4 OJ No. L. 60, 28.2.2014, p. 34. 
5 OJ No. L. 173, 12.6.2014, p. 190. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th September, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [486] 3 

Council Directive 82/891/EEC, and Directives 
2001/24/EC, 2002/47/EC, 2004/25/EC, 2005/56/EC, 
2007/36/EC, 
and 
2013/36/EU, and Regulations (EU) No 1093/2010 
and (EU) No 648/2012, of the European Parliament 
and of the Council, 

2011/35/EU, 

2012/30/EU 

(c) Directive 

(EU) 2015/2366 of 

the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 25 November 20156 
on payment services in the internal market, amending 
Directives 
and 
2013/36/EU and Regulation (EU) No 1093/2010, and 
repealing Directive 2007/64/EC, 

2009/110/EC 

2002/65/EC, 

(d) Directive (EU) 2018/843 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 30 May 20187 amending 
Directive (EU) 2015/849 on the prevention of the use 
of the financial system for the purposes of money 
laundering or terrorist financing, and amending 
Directives 2009/138/EC and 2013/36/EU, 

(e) Directive (EU) 2019/878 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 20 May 20198 amending 
Directive 2013/36/EU as regards exempted entities, 
financial holding companies, mixed financial holding 
companies, remuneration, supervisory measures and 
powers and capital conservation measures, 

(f) Directive 

(EU) 2019/2034 of 

the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 27 November 20199 
on the prudential supervision of investment firms and 
amending Directives 2002/87/EC, 2009/65/EC, 
2011/61/EU, 
and 
2014/65/EU, 

2013/36/EU, 

2014/59/EU 

(g) Directive (EU) 2021/338 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 16 February 202110 amending 
Directive 2014/65/EU as 
information 
requirements, product governance and position 
(EU) 
limits, and Directives 2013/36/EU and 
2019/878 as regards their application to investment 
firms, to help the recovery from the COVID-19 
crisis;”, and 

regards 

(b) by the deletion of the definition of “Codified Banking Directive”.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 4. Section 16 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (3), by the
text_raw:
4. Section 16 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (3), by the 
substitution of “the implementation of, or compliance with, the Capital 
Requirements Directive” for “the implementation of, or compliance with, the 
Codified Banking Directive”. 

Amendment of section 19 of Principal Act
text_norm: 4 section 16 principal act amended subsection (3) substitution implementation compliance capital requirement directive implementation compliance codified banking directive  amendment section 19 principal act

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of
heading: 5. Section 19 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (1)(f), by the
text_raw:
5. Section 19 of the Principal Act is amended, in subsection (1)(f), by the 
substitution of “Capital Requirements Directive” for “Codified Banking 
Directive”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 September, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance.
